NK040(thi)008:1: // gcod kyi 'bum bskul byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun ma bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)008:2: ma yum chen thugs las sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)008:3: ma cig jo mo rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)008:4: pha rol phyin pa'i grub thob ma //
NK040(thi)008:5: skal ldan kun gyi rgyud grol ma //
NK040(thi)008:6: skal med thar pa'i lam 'dren ma //
NK040(thi)008:8: mtho spyi gtsug rgyan der bzhugs su gsol //
NK040(thi)008:9: bzhugs nas byin gyis brlabs du gsol //
NK040(thi)008:10: ma chos dbyings nam mkha' yongs pa'i pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)008:11: thugs rje'i sprin phung thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)008:12: shes rab nyi 'od ta le ba //
NK040(thi)008:13: nyams dbyangs mgur ma 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)008:14: byin rlab chu rgyun si li li //
NK040(thi)008:15: byin gyis rlobs shig ma cig ma //
NK040(thi)008:16: bar chad sol cig ma cig ma //
NK040(thi)008:17: dbang mchog bskur zhig ma cig ma //
NK040(thi)008:18: dngos grub stsol zhig ma cig ma //
NK040(thi)008:19: lam sna drongs shig ma cig ma //
NK040(thi)008:20: ma mi min ye shes mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)008:21: lab sgron khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)008:22: 'og min gnas su lam sna drongs //
NK040(thi)008:23: mkha' spyod gnas su lam sna drongs //
NK040(thi)008:24: u rgyan gnas su lam sna drongs //
NK040(thi)008:25: ma shar nas gom bdun byon pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)008:26: sku lus chung la sku mdog dkar //
NK040(thi)008:29: ma lho nas gom bdun byon pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)008:30: sku lu chung la sku mdog ser //
NK040(thi)008:33: ma nub nas gom bdun byon pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)008:34: sku lus chung la sku mdog dmar //
NK040(thi)008:37: ma byang nas gom bdun byon pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)008:38: sku lus chung la sku mdog ljang //
NK040(thi)008:41: ma dbus nas gom bdun byon pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)008:42: sku lus chung la sku mdog sngo //
NK040(thi)008:45: mtho spyi gtsug rgyan der bzhugs su gsol //
NK040(thi)008:47: u rgyan gnas su lam sna drongs //
